target: Thank you for contacting us and have a nice day.
context: <user> I'm looking for an expensive restaurant in the south. <system> I have two that fit that description, would you prefer Chinese or Portuguese? <user> Either one. I just need it to be open on Sunday. <system> Okay, lets do the Lucky Star. Would you like a reservation? <user> I would like that. A table for 8 at 12:00. <system> I have booked a table for 8 at the Lucky Star. The reference number is IILATPJI . Is there anything else I can help you with? <user> I'm looking for a guesthouse to stay at. It should have free parking. <system> The acorn guest house would be perfect. Shall I book it ?<user> Yes, that would be great. I'll need it booked for the same group of people, 2 nights, and starting on the same day. <system> Your hotel reservation number is D6UOJ6SH, for Sunday, 8 people for two nights. Is there anything else I can help you with?<user> i dont think so. i think thats all. take care. bye. <system>
